public class HystrixCassandraGetRowsByQuery<RowKeyType>
extends AbstractCassandraHystrixCommand<com.netflix.astyanax.model.Rows<RowKeyType,java.lang.String>>

Fetches values in multiple rows from Cassandra using the CQL query language.

See http://crlog.info/2011/06/13/cassandra-query-language-cql-v1-0-0-updated/
